snippet: Karel De Gucht, the European Union’s trade commissioner,  called for a group that would coordinate the work of regulators in Europe and the United States.
lead_paragraph: Karel De Gucht, the European Union’s trade commissioner,  called for a group that would coordinate the work of regulators in Europe and the United States.

headline.main: European Trade Chief Proposes Trans-Atlantic Working Group
headline.print_headline: European Trade Chief Proposes Trans-Atlantic Working Group
